mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room ( room_num, room_name, room_type, description, created_by, max_members) VALUES ( chat_room_seq.nextval, #{room_name}, #{room_type}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created_by}, #{max_members,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT r.room_num, r.room_name, r.room_type, r.description, r.created_by, r.max_members, r.is_active, r.created_at, r.updated_at, m.role FROM chat_room r JOIN chat_member m ON r.room_num = m.room_num WHERE m.user_num = #{member_num} AND r.is_active = 'Y' ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
